channel.title: Posts on Spatial Group
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Spatial Group

item.title: Kamal's review of spatial causal inference published
item.description: We are very proud of Kamal’s achievement, publishing his first first-authored paper in Geographical Analysis!

item.title: Martin promoted to Associate Professor
item.description: Effective from January 2022, Martin has been promoted to Associate Professor.

item.title: Biogeoref2021 Hackaton win for our team!
item.description: It is with immense pride that we share that our team consisting of Ehsan Hamzei, Kimia Amoozandeh and Kamal Akbari have won the BioGeoRef2021 Hackaton, organised as part of the Spatial Data Science 2021 Symposium.

item.title: Re-launch of the site
item.description: After a long hiatus, this Website is coming back to life.

item.title: Seeking a Research Fellow in Indigenous Engineering Mapping!
item.description: We are growing! Join us for a fascinating research journey into the history of Indigenous Engineering in Australia.

item.title: Come and help us breathe life into the future of Mapping!
item.description: We have acquired an exciting new piece of equipment â€“ a Clearpath Robotics Husky Autonomous Ground Vehicle, fully kitted with a variety of sensors, including automotive-standard Velodyne LIDAR.
